alert.note: Alert for Bath; Fleming; Menifee; Montgomery; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 7:54PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Montgomery, Bath, northern Menifee, eastern Fleming and Rowan Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 753 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pebble to Slate Valley to near Hope. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Marshall, Wyoming and Polksville around 800 PM EDT. Sudith and Moore`s Ferry around 805 PM EDT. Hillsboro and Grange City around 810 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Salt Lick, Sharkey, Young Springs, Ringos Mills, Ramey, Poplar Plains, Goddard, Midland, Hilda, Plummers Landing, Yale, Farmers, Wallingford, Morehead, Zilpo, Cogswell, Hays Crossing, Munson, Muses Mills, Cranston, Bangor, Lick Fork and Waltz. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
